author: Hannah Weil McKinley
title: The Sexiest Bras For Small Busts
text:
Best Bras For Small Busts The Sexiest Bras For Small Busts January 27, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 The Sexiest Bras For Small Busts 
When feeling sexy is on your mind, as it tends to be around Valentine's Day , finding the right underthings typically falls at the top of our list. But because fit is a particular challenge for women who are smaller on top , we're on the hunt for the bras and bralettes that are made to flaunt what you've got — or help fake it instead. 
The trick is embracing plunging cuts, sheer and lacy finishes, strategic underwire, and even a well-placed floral appliqué to shape what you've got. And while playful cuts that don't offer lots of support can be a challenge for women with bigger chests, you're in luck — it's your chance to play with all kinds of flirty silhouettes. Just read on to shop our editors' picks. Related:
